about_the_game:
Poke the dungeon and stick around to see what comes out! Every 60 minutes you will receive a tradeable mob in the form of a Steam Item. Grow an impressive collection of unique mobs to show off and trade with other players on the Steam Market!

Drop Rate

Every 60 minutes the game will drop a mob at the following drop rates:
  • Common Mobs = 95%
  • Rare Mobs = 4.99%
  • Mythical Mobs = 0.01%

Rotating Drops

Every Monday*, 12 Common Mobs, 6 Rare Mobs, and 3 Mythical Mobs will be randomly selected as the active drops for the week. Releases of new Common Mobs and Rare Mobs will be placed into the item shop, and will only leave the shop until they're randomly selected as an active drop. Once the shop falls below 5 mobs, inactive Rare Mobs will be randomly selected to be placed in the shop, where they will remain until they become active drops again.

*For the first month of release, all mobs will be active drops to initialize and populate the market. This period may be reduced or extended depending on the amount of active traders.

Feature in Development

The ability to view your Steam Inventory in-game and exchange mobs for additional rolls:
  • Exchange 3 common mobs for a rare roll (95% Common / 5% Rare)
  • Exchange 3 rare mobs for a mythic roll (99% Rare / 1% Mythical)

    More information available on our Discord.

    Subject to change

Poke the dungeon and stick around to see what comes out! Every 60 minutes you will receive a tradeable mob in the form of a Steam Item. Grow an impressive collection of unique mobs to show off and trade with other players on the Steam Market!

Every 60 minutes the game will drop a mob at the following drop rates:
  • Common Mobs = 95%
  • Rare Mobs = 4.99%
  • Mythical Mobs = 0.01%

Every Monday*, 12 Common Mobs, 6 Rare Mobs, and 3 Mythical Mobs will be randomly selected as the active drops for the week. Releases of new Common Mobs and Rare Mobs will be placed into the item shop, and will only leave the shop until they're randomly selected as an active drop. Once the shop falls below 5 mobs, inactive Rare Mobs will be randomly selected to be placed in the shop, where they will remain until they become active drops again.

*For the first month of release, all mobs will be active drops to initialize and populate the market. This period may be reduced or extended depending on the amount of active traders.

Feature in Development

The ability to view your Steam Inventory in-game and exchange mobs for additional rolls:
  • Exchange 3 common mobs for a rare roll (95% Common / 5% Rare)
  • Exchange 3 rare mobs for a mythic roll (99% Rare / 1% Mythical)

    More information available on our Discord.

    Subject to change
name: Mob Trader

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Indonesian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*, Afrikaans*, Albanian*, Amharic*, Armenian*, Assamese*, Azerbaijani*, Bangla*, Basque*, Belarusian*, Bosnian*, Catalan*, Cherokee*, Croatian*, Dari*, Estonian*, Filipino*, Galician*, Georgian*, Gujarati*, Hausa*, Hebrew*, Hindi*, Icelandic*, Igbo*, Irish*, K'iche'*, Kannada*, Kazakh*, Khmer*, Kinyarwanda*, Konkani*, Kyrgyz*, Latvian*, Lithuanian*, Luxembourgish*, Macedonian*, Malay*, Malayalam*, Maltese*, Maori*, Marathi*, Mongolian*, Nepali*, Odia*, Persian*, Punjabi (Gurmukhi)*, Punjabi (Shahmukhi)*, Quechua*, Scots*, Serbian*, Sindhi*, Sinhala*, Slovak*, Slovenian*, Sorani*, Sotho*, Swahili*, Tajik*, Tamil*, Tatar*, Telugu*, Tigrinya*, Tswana*, Turkmen*, Urdu*, Uyghur*, Uzbek*, Valencian*, Welsh*, Wolof*, Xhosa*, Yoruba*, Zulu*
